resources.string: The numbers shown are current RPM / max RPM. Revolutions Per Minute (RPM) measures how fast the ball rotates. Press the reset key to set max RPM to 0.

1. Hold the phone in your dominate hand firmly. Swipe the ball with your thumb to start rotation.\n2. After RPM>2000, apply a rapid left to right motion to accelerating the rotation.\n3. If exercise done, press the ball to stop rotation.
